\pgfkeys{
%    /pgf/number format/precision=4, 
    /pgf/number format/fixed zerofill=true }
\pgfplotstableset{
%    /color cells/min/.initial=0,
%    /color cells/max/.initial=1000,
%    /color cells/textcolor/.initial=,
    %
    color cells/.code={%
        \pgfqkeys{/color cells}{#1}%
        \pgfkeysalso{%
            postproc cell content/.code={%
                %
                \begingroup
                %
                % acquire the value before any number printer changed
                % it:
                \pgfkeysgetvalue{/pgfplots/table/@preprocessed cell content}\value
\ifx\value\empty
\endgroup
\else
                \pgfmathfloatparsenumber{\value}%
                \pgfmathfloattofixed{\pgfmathresult}%
                \let\value=\pgfmathresult
                %
                % map that value:
                \pgfplotscolormapaccess[\pgfkeysvalueof{/color cells/min}:\pgfkeysvalueof{/color cells/max}]%
                    {\value}%
                    {\pgfkeysvalueof{/pgfplots/colormap name}}%
                % 
                % acquire the value AFTER any preprocessor or
                % typesetter (like number printer) worked on it:
                \pgfkeysgetvalue{/pgfplots/table/@cell content}\typesetvalue
                \pgfkeysgetvalue{/color cells/textcolor}\textcolorvalue
                %
                % tex-expansion control
                \toks0=\expandafter{\typesetvalue}%
                \xdef\temp{%
                    \noexpand\pgfkeysalso{%
                        @cell content={%
                            \noexpand\cellcolor[rgb]{\pgfmathresult}%
                            \noexpand\definecolor{mapped color}{rgb}{\pgfmathresult}%
                            \ifx\textcolorvalue\empty
                            \else
                                \noexpand\color{\textcolorvalue}%
                            \fi
                            \the\toks0 %
                        }%
                    }%
                }%
                \endgroup
                \temp
\fi
            }%
        }%
    }
}

\newcounter{diagramindex} % counter for the matrix rows and columns

\newcommand{\diagram}[3]{
 % create the entries in a matrix
 \setcounter{diagramindex}{0}
 \foreach \val in {#1}
 {
   \stepcounter{diagramindex}
   \expandafter\gappto\expandafter#2\expandafter{\val\\}
 }
 % add a row to the matrix
 \stepcounter{diagramindex}
 \node[myrecord] (r\theDiagramindex) at (#2) {};
 \node[mygrid] (g\theDiagramindex) at (#3) {};
 \node[mydots] (d\theDiagramindex) at (#3) {D};
}

\newcommand{\drawmatrix}[1]{
 % draw the matrix
 \matrix (#1) [matrix of nodes, \noderules, nodes={myrecord}]
 {
   % add the entries in the first row
   \foreach \val in {#1} {
     \node at (r1.west) {\val};
   }
   % add the entries in the last row
   \foreach \val in {#1} {
     \node at (r\theDiagramindex.east) {\val};
   }
   % add the horizontal lines
   \foreach \x in {1,2} {
     \draw (r\x.west) -- (g\x.east);
   }
   % add the vertical lines
   \foreach \y in {1,2} {
     \draw (g\y.north) -- (r\theDiagramindex.south);
   }
 };
 \begin{scope}[on background layer] % draw the grid
   \draw[pattern=north west lines, pattern color=gray!50]
     (#1.north west) rectangle (#1.south east);
 \end{scope}
 \begin{scope}[on background layer] % draw the labels
   \foreach \val/\dir in {#1} {
   \node[mylabel] at (r\theDiagramindex.east) {\contour{white}{\val}};
   \node[legend box] 
     (lbl\theDiagramindex-\dir) 
     at (r\theDiagramindex.east|-g\dir) 
     [legend label] {\val};
   \draw (r\theDiagramindex.east) |- (g\dir);
   }
 \end{scope}
}
